center.bold: Marie Schauer, Appellee, v. Abraham Zachorow et al., Defendants Below.
On Appeal of Mabel Clingman, Appellant.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. SAMUEL B. EPSTEIN, Judge, presiding. Order reversed. Heard in the second division, first district, this court at the December term, 1951.
opinion.attorneys:
Nathan Wolfberg, for appellant;
no appearance for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text: Not to be published in full. Opinion filed October 17, 1952; released for publication November 18, 1952.Page 187
